verses.verse: And there was a famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> that was in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Abraham. <S%H85><s%> And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> to Gerar. <S%H1642><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H3381><s%> not down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I shall tell <S%H559><s%> you of:

Sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in this <S%H2063><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and I will be with you, and will bless <S%H1288><s%> you; for to you, and to your seed, <S%H2233><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H411><s%> countries, <S%H776><s%> and I will perform <S%H6965><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%> your father; <S%H1><s%>

And I will make your seed <S%H2233><s%> to multiply <S%H7235><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> to your seed <S%H2233><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H411><s%> countries; <S%H776><s%> and in your seed <S%H2233><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> be blessed; <S%H1288><s%>

Because <S%H6118><s%> that Abraham <S%H85><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and kept <S%H8104><s%> my charge, <S%H4931><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and my laws. <S%H8451><s%>
And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Gerar: <S%H1642><s%>

And the men <S%H582><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> him of his wife; <S%H802><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> She is my sister: <S%H269><s%> for he feared <S%H3372><s%> to say, <S%H559><s%> She is my wife; <S%H802><s%> lest, <S%H6435><s%> said <S%H559><s%> he, the men <S%H582><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> should kill <S%H2026><s%> me for Rebekah; <S%H7259><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> she was fair <S%H2896><s%> to look <S%H4758><s%> on.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> he had been there <S%H8033><s%> a long <S%H748><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> that Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> looked <S%H8259><s%> out at <S%H1157><s%> a window, <S%H2474><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was sporting <S%H6711><s%> with Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his wife. <S%H802><s%>

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> of a surety <S%H389><s%> she is your wife; <S%H802><s%> and how <S%H349><s%> said <S%H559><s%> you, She is my sister? <S%H269><s%> And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Because <S%H3588><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> Lest <S%H6435><s%> I die <S%H4191><s%> for her.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2063><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> to us? one <S%H259><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> might lightly <S%H4592><s%> have lien <S%H7901><s%> with your wife, <S%H802><s%> and you should have brought <S%H935><s%> guiltiness <S%H817><s%> on us.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> He that touches <S%H5060><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> man <S%H376><s%> or his wife <S%H802><s%> shall surely be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

Then Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sowed <S%H2232><s%> in that land, <S%H776><s%> and received <S%H4672><s%> in the same <S%H1931><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> an hundred times: <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8180><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him.

And the man <S%H376><s%> waxed great, <S%H1431><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> forward, <S%H1980><s%> and grew <S%H1432><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he became <S%H1431><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> great: <S%H1431><s%>

For he had possession <S%H4735><s%> of flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and possession <S%H4735><s%> of herds, <S%H1241><s%> and great <S%H7227><s%> store of servants: <S%H5657><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> envied <S%H7065><s%> him.

For all <S%H3605><s%> the wells <S%H875><s%> which <S%H834><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> had dig <S%H2658><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had stopped <S%H5640><s%> them, and filled <S%H4390><s%> them with earth. <S%H6083><s%>
And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> Go <S%H3212><s%> from us; for you are much <S%H3966><s%> mightier <S%H6105><s%> than we.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> his tent in the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Gerar, <S%H1642><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> dig <S%H2658><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the wells <S%H875><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had dig <S%H2658><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his father; <S%H1><s%> for the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had stopped <S%H5640><s%> them after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Abraham: <S%H85><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> their names <S%H8034><s%> after the names <S%H8034><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had called <S%H7121><s%> them.

And Isaac's <S%H3327><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> dig <S%H2658><s%> in the valley, <S%H5158><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> a well <S%H875><s%> of springing <S%H2416><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

And the herdsmen <S%H7462><s%> of Gerar <S%H1642><s%> did strive <S%H7378><s%> with Isaac's <S%H3327><s%> herdsmen, <S%H7462><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The water <S%H4325><s%> is ours: and he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the well <S%H875><s%> Esek; <S%H6230><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they strove <S%H6229><s%> with him.
And they dig <S%H2658><s%> another <S%H312><s%> well, <S%H875><s%> and strove <S%H7378><s%> for that also: <S%H1571><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of it Sitnah. <S%H7856><s%>

And he removed <S%H6275><s%> from there, <S%H8033><s%> and dig <S%H2658><s%> another <S%H312><s%> well; <S%H875><s%> and for that they strove <S%H7378><s%> not: and he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of it Rehoboth; <S%H7344><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> For now <S%H6258><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has made room <S%H7337><s%> for us, and we shall be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>
And he went <S%H5927><s%> up from there <S%H8033><s%> to Beersheba. <S%H884><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him the same <S%H1931><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I am the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> your father: <S%H1><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not, for I am with you, and will bless <S%H1288><s%> you, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> for my servant <S%H5650><s%> Abraham's <S%H85><s%> sake. <S%H5668><s%>

And he built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> there: <S%H8033><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> Isaac's <S%H3327><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> dig <S%H3738><s%> a well. <S%H875><s%>

Then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to him from Gerar, <S%H1642><s%> and Ahuzzath <S%H276><s%> one of his friends, <S%H4828><s%> and Phichol <S%H6369><s%> the chief captain <S%H8269><s%> of his army. <S%H6635><s%>
And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Why <S%H4069><s%> come <S%H935><s%> you to me, seeing you hate <S%H8130><s%> me, and have sent <S%H7971><s%> me away from you?

And they said, <S%H559><s%> We saw <S%H7200><s%> certainly that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with you: and we said, <S%H559><s%> Let there be now <S%H4994><s%> an oath <S%H423><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us, even between <S%H996><s%> us and you, and let us make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you;

That you will do <S%H6213><s%> us no <S%H3808><s%> hurt, <S%H7451><s%> as we have not touched <S%H5060><s%> you, and as we have done <S%H6213><s%> to you nothing <S%H7535><s%> but good, <S%H2896><s%> and have sent <S%H7971><s%> you away in peace: <S%H7965><s%> you are now <S%H6258><s%> the blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And he made <S%H6213><s%> them a feast, <S%H4960><s%> and they did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink. <S%H8354><s%>

And they rose <S%H7925><s%> up betimes <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another: <S%H251><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them away, and they departed <S%H3212><s%> from him in peace. <S%H7965><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass the same day, <S%H3117><s%> that Isaac's <S%H3327><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> him concerning <S%H5921><s%> <S%H182><s%> the well <S%H875><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had dig, <S%H2658><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, We have found <S%H4672><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> it Shebah: <S%H7656><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> is Beersheba <S%H884><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> was forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he took <S%H3947><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%> Judith <S%H3067><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Beeri <S%H882><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and Bashemath <S%H1315><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Elon <S%H356><s%> the Hittite: <S%H2850><s%>
Which were a grief <S%H4786><s%> of mind <S%H7307><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and to Rebekah. <S%H7259><s%>
